ai-patthana17.2:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in the teachings.)
ai-patthana17.2:0.3_0: These are the different kinds of result.
ai-patthana17.2:3.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the unskillful qualities that gives rise to the results of good deeds.
ai-patthana17.2:3.1_1: There is no cause or condition for the result of deeds.
ai-patthana17.2:3.1_2: There are neither skillful nor unskillful qualities. And because of the results of good and bad deeds, and not arise because of causes and reasons.
ai-patthana17.2:4.1_2: There are deeds that are unskillful, not liable to grow old, not unskillful qualities or results in line with the teaching.
ai-patthana17.2:6.1_1: There is no such thing as the result of past deeds, caused by not having the result of deeds.
ai-patthana17.2:6.1_2: There are no such result of deeds that are not liable to cause or condition for the result of deeds.
